message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $18,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but my budget is limited. Would you consider selling it for $15,000?
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I'm willing to come down a bit, but $15,000 is too low.  Could you do $16,500?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm willing to offer $16,000 for the product. This brings us closer to my budget while still acknowledging the value of the item.
